name: Create Okta accounts from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create an account in Okta with the information provided. The template uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eHe6V-d0C20tpSbtJLuFT8IQUH8qI7yFaIZ9lk_c8Pk/edit#gid=0).
